snippet: Stormy weather in the Adriatic Sea thwarted efforts on Wednesday to tow a damaged ferry to port in southern Italy.
abstract: Stormy weather in Adriatic Sea prevents Italian authorities from investigating deadly blaze that destroyed ferry traveling from Greece to Italy; 11 people died in fire and fate of estimated 98 others is unknown, as there are questions about exactly how many people were on board or if some were rescued by other vessels.
lead_paragraph: Stormy weather in the Adriatic Sea thwarted efforts on Wednesday to tow a damaged ferry to port in southern Italy.

headline.main: Italy: Storm Impedes Effort to Tow Ferry and See if There Are More Victims
headline.print_headline: Italy: Storm Impedes Effort to Tow Ferry and See if There Are More Victims
